Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.
星球平等联盟星际参议院
Location name "ELOP" is a short form of Egalitarian League of Planets, see the corresponding glossary entry.
Location name "Arborian" is a reference to the "Arborian Sentinel" and "Arborian Queen" in game units.
Location name "Caliri" is the first name of a female Amazon character.
Location name "Poz Tk" is a reference to "Poz Tk'Nor", a male Kir'Ko character.
Location name "Terym" is the name of the Kir'Ko tribe led by Poz'Tk'Nor, a male Kir'Ko character.
Location name "Stanizoid" is the first name of a male Dvar character.
A header name of a task. "Scarlet" is a reference to "Scarlet Scepter", see the corresponding glossary entry.
You can win this map by conquering the ELOP Senate. It would be the decisive victory of the Scarlet Scepter against the Egalitarian League of Planets.[br/][br/]Senate Destroyed: {INT_0}/{INT_1}
征服星球平等联盟参议院即可获得这张地图的胜利。这将是绯红节杖击败星球平等联盟的决定性胜利。[br/][br/]摧毁参议院：{INT_0}/{INT_1}
A task description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.
Countable objective description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.
You can win this map by defeating all ELOP alliance commanders and killing their leadership.[br/][br/]ELOP Commanders Defeated: {INT_0}/{INT_1}
击败所有星球平等联盟指挥官并消灭其领导层，即可获得这张地图的胜利。[br/][br/]击败星球平等联盟指挥官：{INT_0}/{INT_1}
A task description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.
击败星球平等联盟指挥官：{INT_0}/{INT_1}
Countable objective description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.
征服星球平等联盟参议院

Take the Interplanetary ELOP Senate by any military means necessary. Without their political leaders the ELOP Confederation will fall into splinter factions that the Shakarn invasion force can take out one by one.
采取任何必要的军事手段拿下星球平等联盟参议院。失去了政治领袖星球平等联盟将分裂成数个派系，届时蜥蜴人的入侵部队可以将他们各个击破。
征服星球平等联盟参议院：{INT_0}/{INT_1}

Getting through the orbital crossfire of our enemies was rough, but now we are in a position to strike back. Everyone who made it down in one piece, gather up! The Chancellor is about to deliver his speech.
尽管穿过敌人的轨道交叉火力十分艰难，但现在的我们已经站在了反击的位置上。所有安全降落的人，集合！首相要开始讲话了。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female) "Chancellor" is a military and political title of the Shakarn.

The Ethereal Stronghold crackled in flames, and it burned for nine long weeks until it burst open, and its molten shards turned into slithering snakes that rained from the sky. Prokarn and Shazora watched their children plunge and spread into the sixteen seas; and they both smiled, for they knew that their offspring would make this world their own.
虚灵据点在烈焰中噼啪作响，燃烧了漫长的九个星期之后，终于爆裂开来，熔化的碎片如同蜿蜒爬行的毒蛇从天空中落下。普罗坎和沙索拉看见他们的孩子纵身跳入了十六片海洋之中；他们都展露出了笑容，因为他们知道，他们的后代将统治这个世界。

Story message. Speaker: "Chancellor Kor" (Shakarn, male) "Ethereal Stronghold" is the name of the mythological Shakarn heaven. "Prokarn" and "Shazora" are mythological Shakarn characters, see their respective glossary entries.
Soldiers of the Scarlet Scepter! Today is the day to recall the creation of our ancestors on Kadalos. Because today comes the moment that we must live up to their legend and lay claim to this galaxy!
绯红节杖的战士们！今天是追忆我们的先祖在卡达洛斯星上诞生的日子。因为今天，我们必须不负先祖的重望，续写他们的传奇，统治这个银河系！
Story message. Speaker: "Chancellor Kor" (Shakarn, male) For "Scarlet Scepter" see the corresponding glossary entry. "Kadalos" is the name of the Shakarn home world.

Our enemies are trapped. They are trembling in fear of the alien invaders that will come to plunder their homes, tear down their defenses. I say, let them wait no longer! Turn up your sonos! Focus your lasers! Tonight, we make the heavens weep!
我们的敌人已经陷入了困境。他们在侵略者面前颤抖不已，他们害怕我们掠夺他们的家园，害怕我们拆毁他们的防御工事。既然如此，我们就别让他们再等了！打开你们的音波武器！聚焦你们的激光！今晚，我们要让天堂哭泣！
You have called me, my Chancellor? Let me be the first to say that your words have been truly inspiring. I haven’t seen any of my troops this motivated since the destruction of the ELOP Void Reactor.
您找我有事吗，首相？我想说您的演讲真是鼓舞人心。自从上次摧毁了星球平等联盟的虚空反应堆之后，我还没见过我的部队如此积极踊跃。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female) "Chancellor" is a military and political title of the Shakarn.

Ahh, yes, General {STR_LeaderFirstName}. It is good to finally meet you in person. As you know, the Scarlet Scepter has been very pleased with your achievements on Celaudius-2. And what better reward could there be than to share the glory of the upcoming victory, when we storm the Interplanetary ELOP Senate side by side?
啊，是的，{STR_LeaderFirstName}将军。很高兴终于见到你本人了。如你所知，绯红节杖对你在克劳迪乌斯 2 号星上的成就非常满意。当我们并肩冲进星球平等联盟星际参议院时，还有什么比共同分享即将到来的胜利荣耀还要好的回报呢？
Story message. Speaker: "Chancellor Kor" (Shakarn, male) "Interplanetary ELOP Senate" is the name of a goverment palace landmark on the map.

Our enemy has mounted strong defensive installations. They need to be destroyed one by one before we attack the bases they are protecting. Once their facilities start falling into our hands, we dismantle them to fuel our own machinery of war. This way, we will grind them down to their last man!
我们的敌人部署了严密的防御设施，我们需要在进攻基地之前逐个摧毁这些设施。一旦他们的设施落入我们手中，我们就能把它们给拆了，然后为我们自己的战争机器提供燃料。这样一来，我们就能把他们彻底击溃！
A header name of a task.

The ELOP territory is fortified with Imperial Defenses. Those structures provide additional combat support to your enemies and need to be razed to the ground![br/][br/][recommendedcol](Hint: Imperial Defense structures will get defended by the garrison of the colony or sector base they are connected to.)[/recommendedcol]
星球平等联盟的领地部署着严密的帝国防御措施。这些建筑会为你的敌人提供额外的战斗支援，因此一定要先将它们夷为平地！[br/][br/][recommendedcol]（提示：与帝国防御建筑相连的殖民地或区域基地中的驻防部队将保护帝国防御建筑。）[/recommendedcol]
Countable objective description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.

Raid the sector bases of your enemy to weaken their supply lines and gain resources to upgrade and reinforce your armies.[br/][br/][recommendedcol](Hint: razing sector bases with an exploitation gives you resources coresponding to the income type of that exploitation.)[/recommendedcol]
突袭敌方区域基地，削弱他们的补给线并获得资源来升级和强化你的军队。[br/][br/][recommendedcol]（提示：夷平一个具有开发点的区域基地可获得与该开发点收益类型相同的资源。）[/recommendedcol]
Countable objective description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.

General? That’s how I’m supposed to call you now, right? I know that I’m not in any position to question your orders, but may I ask why I haven’t been sent to the front lines like everybody else? Is it because you still fear my betrayal?
将军？我现在应该这样称呼你，对吧？我知道我没有资格质疑你的命令，但我能不能冒昧地问一句，为什么我没有像其他人一样被派往前线？难道你还担心我会背叛你？
Story message. Speaker: "James/Jane Henkins" (Vanguard, can be male or female depending on the gender of "Naranga Od". Always has the opposite gender of "Naranga Od".)

No, it isn’t, Jane. But don’t ask questions like these that would make me regret the decision to accept you into our ranks. You are not a trained soldier. And you shouldn’t be seeing the cruelties that happen to your people at the front.
不，不是这样的，简。请不要再问这样的问题了，否则我可能会后悔当初接受你加入我们的决定。你并不是训练有素的士兵，不应该目睹前线士兵遭受的残酷现实。

No, it isn’t, James. But don’t ask questions like these that would make me regret the decision to accept you into our ranks. You are not a trained soldier. And you shouldn’t be seeing the cruelties that happen to your people at the front.
不，不是这样的，詹姆斯。请不要再问这样的问题了，否则我可能会后悔当初接受你加入我们的决定。你并不是训练有素的士兵，不应该目睹前线士兵遭受的残酷现实。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)

But I… need to see the consequences of my actions! When the things I did lead to suffering, how can I look away and ignore the truth? Especially when I need to learn how our two races will be able to coexist in the future.
但我……我要看看自己的行为所造成的后果！要是我的所作所为导致他人受苦，我怎么能置身事外而无视真相呢？尤其是现在，我想要知道我们两个种族究竟如何才能在未来共存。
Story message. Speaker: "James/Jane Henkins" (Vanguard, can be male or female depending on the gender of "Naranga Od". Always has the opposite gender of "Naranga Od".)

There is a simple answer to your last question, Jane: they won’t. We Shakarn don’t mingle with other species. We conquer them.[br/][br/]Now pick up that assault rifle over there. You have a lot to learn.
你最后一个问题的答案很简单，简：不会共存。我们蜥蜴人不会接受其他物种，我们只会征服。[br/][br/]现在，拿起那边的突击步枪，你还有很多东西要学。

There is a simple answer to your last question, James: they won’t. We Shakarn don’t mingle with other species. We conquer them.[br/][br/]Now pick up that assault rifle over there. You have a lot to learn.
你最后一个问题的答案很简单，詹姆斯：不会共存。我们蜥蜴人不会接受其他物种，我们只会征服。[br/][br/]现在，拿起那边的突击步枪，你还有很多东西要学。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)

Now that you have received your well-deserved promotion for your display of cunning and skill on Celaudius-2, I think it would be appropriate to finally ask your real name, agent. What is the actual face beneath your holographic mask?
你在克劳迪乌斯 2 号星上表现出的狡猾与技巧使你获得了当之无愧的晋升，特工。我在想现在我是不是应该知道你真正的名字了？在这张全息影像面具之下，你的真实面孔究竟是谁？
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)
Vastrix Zokla is at your command, General, and ready to move behind enemy lines.[br/][br/]If there is any need to ridicule our opponents while we beat them, just say the word!
瓦特里克斯·佐科拉听候您的差遣，将军，随时准备潜入敌人后方。[br/][br/]如果在打败对手时还需要戏谑他们一番，尽管吩咐即可！

I will keep that in mind, Vastrix Zokla. But for now, your skill and experience are best put to use in one of our front strike commandos. In a war of this scale, there is little time for games and subterfuge.
我会记住这句话的，瓦特里克斯·佐科拉。但是现在，你的技巧和经验最好能用在我们的前线突击队中。在这样庞大规模的战争中，我们没有时间玩游戏和诡计。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)

A storm is coming. The vultures have left their nest amongst the mists to descend on the rotting remains of the once mighty Star Union. But where they see decay, new life has already begun to stir, and they that sowed the wind will reap nothing but the whirlwind.
暴风雨即将来临，秃鹰离开了迷雾中的巢穴，降落在曾经不可一世的星际联盟腐烂残骸之上。虽然它们看见的是腐烂，但新的生命已经开始萌发，那些播种风的人将只会收获狂风。
Story message. Speaker: "First Minister Tholian" (Paragon, male)

If there is one thing my brethren have proven in the past, it is that we will never cease to continue to fight for our freedom. By Ro’Qwer’Z's horn and tail, no enemy shall withstand the fury of the swarm when the Kir’Ko colonies unite to defend their homes!
如果说我的同胞过去证明了一件事，那就是我们将永远不会停止为自由而战。罗奎尔兹在上，当奇尔寇殖民地联合起来保卫家园时，没有任何敌人可以抵挡住族群之怒！
Story message. Speaker: "Poz Tk'Nor" (Kir'Ko, male) "Ro Qwer'Z" is the name of a male Kir'Ko liberation fighter during the Zok'Shiar (see corresponding glossary entries).
Peace is the most valued achievement of the Egalitarian League of Planets. However, when war knocks at our door, we will barricade our gates and defend this peace for all that it is worth.
和平是星球平等联盟最宝贵的成就。然而，当战争叩打柴扉之时，我们将筑起屏障，不惜一切代价保卫和平。

Story message. Speaker: "Nicole Crustus" (Vanguard, female) Actually, Nicole is a female Shakarn sleeper agent. She is talking from the perspective of her cover identity, so this is mostly irrelevant for translation itself, but good as some provided context.

Not all of us Amazons care about the world outside our perfect gardens. Yet those of us who were blessed with the curiosity to venture out and study all aspects of life have found that such gardens can exist in many shapes and forms.[br/][br/]We are not afraid of predators.
并不是所有的亚马逊人都关心我们完美花园之外的世界。但像我们这样得到了好奇心眷顾之人，乐意探索和研究生活的方方面面。我们发现，完美的花园能够以多种形式存在。[br/][br/]我们绝不会惧怕掠食者。

As Dvar, I can appreciate the beauty of a well-organized defense being tested in a display of firepower and battle skill. But when the same opponent makes use of foul play and defiles the members of my Consortium, my family, he becomes the enemy, and by the hammer of Rogody Zhelezo, you shall taste my revenge!
身为矮人，我很欣赏组织有序的防御工事在接受炮火和战斗的检验时所展现出来的美感。但是，如果对手利用肮脏的手段戏弄我的财团成员，污蔑我的家人，那他就是我的敌人。以罗格迪·泽勒佐之锤的名义，你将尝到复仇的滋味！
Story message. Speaker: "Korvin Zhelezo" (Dvar, male) "Rogody Zhelezo" is the name of a male Dvar character.
Good. Let the ELOP commanders snarl and growl with all their might! There is no glory in beating a feeble foe!
好。让星球平等联盟的指挥官全力咆哮呐喊吧！打败一个弱小的敌人毫无荣耀可言！
A header name of a task.
To win this map, you need to push back the Voidbringer invasion. There can be no victory for the Shakarn while these denizens of oblivion still keep emerging from the Void.
击退虚空使者的入侵即可获得这张地图的胜利。只要这些妄图带来湮灭的虚空住民不断从虚空中现身，蜥蜴人就无法取得胜利。
A task description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.
Dali Ardelli wants you to provide him with a sound system powerful enough "to tear the Abyss open". A couple of repurposed sono blasters should do.
达里·阿德里希望你为他提供一个足够强大的音波系统来“将深渊撕出一条裂口”。几把经过改装的音波爆能枪应该满足他的需求。
Refactor sono blasters into a just barely non-lethal sound system for Dali Ardelli.
为达里·阿德里将音波爆能枪改装成不会造成致命伤害的音波系统。

Dali Ardelli has invited you to join his "concert" in anticipation of the arriving Voidbringers. We should send some of our scientists to observe the spectacle and find out if these Voidbringers will become an actual threat.
达里·阿德里邀请你参加他为即将到来的虚空使者精心准备的“音乐会”。我们应该派一些科学家前去查看这一盛事，顺便弄清楚这些虚空使者是否会成为真正的威胁。
Analysis of the supernatural phenomena observed during the concert of Dali Ardelli.
在达里·阿德里音乐会中观察到的超自然现象分析结果。
The leaders of the ELOP Confederation fled from the Interplanetary ELOP Senate to the headquarters of their commanders. We need to crush them all.
星球平等联盟的领导人从星球平等联盟星际参议院逃到了他们指挥官的总部。我们必须把他们全部消灭。
Countable objective description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.
Countable objective description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.
Countable objective description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.
Countable objective description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.

The Voidbringer Beacon is protected by a powerful barrier. To be able to break through it, you need to collect infused shards from the spawners that the Voidbringers keep dropping down to invade the planet.
虚空使者信标被一个强大的屏障保护。为了打破屏障，你需要在虚空使者向这个星球不断投放的出生点中收集灌注碎片。
Countable objective description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.

Brick by brick, the fortifications of our enemies are crumbling in the amplified sound cones of our war machines.[br/][br/]Well done, General {STR_LeaderFirstName}! You deserve to field the most devastating of Shakarn war gear under your command.
敌人的防御工事在我们战争机器的强化音波筒中逐渐崩塌。[br/][br/]干得漂亮，{STR_LeaderFirstName}将军！你果然有资格指挥蜥蜴人最具破坏性的战具。

Let all walls be torn down and the fertile lands of the enemy be reduced to ashes. There can be no rest until the last fort is slighted and the last city lies in ruins.[br/][br/]The time has come, General {STR_LeaderFirstName}. Deploy the Sonokarn!
让所有的城墙都被拆毁，让敌人的沃土化为灰烬，直到最后的堡垒被攻破，直到最后的城市变成废墟，我们才会停下脚步。[br/][br/]时机已到，{STR_LeaderFirstName}将军。部署声波碑船！
Story message. Speaker: "Chancellor Kor" (Shakarn, male) "Sonokarn" is the name of a Shakarn unit.
With pleasure, my Chancellor. Nothing compares to igniting the engine of a world destroyer!
很荣幸，我的首相。没有什么比得上发动世界毁灭者的引擎！
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female) "Chancellor" is a military and political title of the Shakarn.

As thrall of the Voidbringers there can only be one way to victory: swipe away the remaining fools that still dare to stand in the path of your Voidbringer masters![br//][br/]Resisting Commanders Defeated: {INT_0}/{INT_1}
作为虚空使者的奴隶，只有一个胜利方法：把那些仍然胆敢妨碍虚空使者主人的傻瓜通通消灭！[br//][br/]击败抵抗的指挥官：{INT_0}/{INT_1}
A task description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.
Countable objective description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.

Marvelous! More fans of fear and fell dominance have come to join the stage of Dali Ardelli’s greatest performance. The ELOP Confederation may have rejected my offer to act as ambassador to the Syndicate, denouncing my torture practices as barbarism. Instead they’re still all over that runaway slave dog, Marlok Tenor. Pathetic!
太棒了！更多的恐惧和邪恶统治爱好者加入了达里·阿德里最伟大的表演舞台。星球平等联盟拒绝了我担任辛迪加大使的提议，还谴责我的酷刑是野蛮之举，最后竟然选择了那个逃亡的奴隶狗马洛克·泰诺。真是可悲至极！
Story message. Speaker: "Dali Ardelli" (Syndicate, male) "Marlok Tenor" is the name of a male Syndicate character.

But luckily this was never my primary reason to come to Parlamon Alpha. The sounds from the Abyss have called me, summoned me, enticed my artistic appetite. As a disciple of Psynumbra, I am used to a lifestyle of heavy metal, but the future I have glimpsed during the past few days is even more hardcore.
但幸运的是，这并不是我来帕尔拉蒙阿尔法星的主要原因。来自深渊的声音在召唤我，引导我，诱使我的艺术欲望。身为赛努布拉的信徒，我早已习惯了重金属的生活方式。然而在过去的几天里，我所瞥见的未来更加残酷。
Story message. Speaker: "Dali Ardelli" (Syndicate, male) "Parlamon Alpha" is the name of the planet the mission plays on.

They are awake. They who slept beyond the Abyss. And now they need to be greeted and welcomed in a way that is worthy of their presence – and of my reputation as an artist. I have already built and set the stage. The ambience will be provided by your war. Now the only thing that’s missing is a fitting sound system to blast away the audience.
沉睡在深渊另一侧的人已经苏醒。现在，他们应当得到与他们的仪态相称的欢迎，与我身为艺术家的名誉相称的欢迎。我已经搭建好了舞台，你们的战争将成为这场演出的布景。现在唯一缺少的，就是一套合适的声音系统来点燃观众的心灵。

That’s where you come into play. My scouts have witnessed the power of your sound-based weapons on the battlefield. Their deadly resonance provides exactly the intensity level that I’ve been looking for...
这就到了你发挥作用的时候了。我的侦察兵在战场上见识了你们音波武器的威力，这种致命的共振正好符合我一直在寻找的声音强度水平……

You have a curious interest in death and suffering, human. And you are bold to approach the Scarlet Scepter with your request to share weaponry. Very bold. It is your immense luck that you and your band of death-greeters are too insignificant to be considered a threat by us, or your career would be meeting a literal dead end now.
你对死亡和苦难有一种奇怪的兴趣，人类。你竟敢如此大胆地靠近绯红节杖，并要求我们与你分享武器。庆幸自己的好运吧，因为你和你的那些死亡来客对我们而言微不足道，我们根本不会把他们当做威胁，否则你的事业必将终结。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)

Any assistance you might receive from our hands would be nothing less but an act of courtesy. Consider this conversation a message to the Syndicate people that there can be gratification for those that bow down to the might of the Shakarn.
你从我们手中得到的任何帮助都只是我们出于礼节而给予的，请把此当成一条消息转告给所有辛迪加人：只要屈服于蜥蜴人的力量，任何条件都可以满足。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)

Hell yes! All measured sound levels are going off the charts! Finally, I will be able to ring out the anthem of the Abyss in all its might. Join the audience, {STR_LeaderName}! This concert will be a singular experience!
太好了！所有测量到的声音水平都爆表了！我终于能够奏出最强大的深渊圣歌了。成为我的听众吧，{STR_LeaderName}！这场音乐会必将是一次非凡的经历！

As General of the Scarlet Scepter, I have more important things to do than to attend to questionable debaucheries of this kind. However, I will be sending a Shakarn delegation to ensure that there won’t be any use or analysis of our technology in ways that were not agreed upon.
身为绯红节杖的将军，我还有更重要的事情要做，没空参加这类值得商榷的放纵行为。不过，我会派一支蜥蜴人代表团过来，确保你在使用和分析我们的技术时没有超出我们协议的范围。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)

Is the report I received true, General? That you have been sharing weapons with the Syndicate, our enemies? You are aware that such an action would have to be considered an act of treason if not committed due to extraordinary reasons.
将军，我收到的报告是否属实？你竟然向我们的敌人辛迪加提供武器？如果你无法对此等行为给出合理的解释，这将被视为叛变。

You have every right to question my methods in this affair, my Chancellor. But you can be assured that my actions were motivated by matters of the gravest concern. In my Celaudius-2 reports, I described the encounters with a new type of Psi-Fish we currently call the ‘Voidbringers’.
您完全有权利质疑我在这件事上的做法，首相，但您大可以放心我在此事上的动机。我这样做的原因是有一件事让我十分担忧。在我发来的克劳迪乌斯 2 号星球报告中，我曾经提到过一种新型的灵能水母。我们现在将其称为“虚空使者”。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)

Single entities of these ‘Voidbringers’ have now been spotted on Parlamon Alpha, and – if there is any credibility to Dali Ardelli’s words – many more could be on their way. If they turn out to be a serious threat, I want to be prepared.
我们目前已经在帕尔拉蒙阿尔法星上发现了这些“虚空使者”的存在。如果达里·阿德里的话有那么一丝真实性，那么就可能还会有更多的虚空使者来临。如果它们带来严重的威胁，我想要提前做好准备。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)

Your initiative is duly noted, General {STR_LeaderFirstName}. But you should not conduct matters of this scope behind your Chancellor’s back, nor let them distract you from performing your role as General in this war.
我明白了，{STR_LeaderFirstName}将军。但你不应该背着我处理这么大的事情，也不应该分散你在战争中的注意力。你是这场战争的将军，统领兵帅才是你的职责。
Living hard, living bound[br/]Lifetime ticket chained to the ground[br/]I ask it all, give it now![br/]Taking everything while you have to bow!
生活艰苦，处处碰壁[br/]一生之票将你拴在地[br/]立刻拿来，我全部都要！[br/]带走一切，你屈膝弯腰！
Story message. Speaker: "Dali Ardelli" (Syndicate, male) Entire text is a reference to the "Highway to Hell" lyrics.
We’re all going down![br/]All the way[br/]Through the Abyss![br/]Whoa…
我们全都向下而行！[br/]千里迢迢[br/]深渊之召！[br/]哦啊……
Story message. Speaker: "Dali Ardelli" (Syndicate, male) Entire text is a reference to the "Highway to Hell" lyrics.
Physical Thrall. Offering Of Energy. Crimson Vibrations.[br/][br/]Satiate Our Appetite.
束缚肉体。献上能量。深红色的振动。[br/][br/]满足我们的贪欲。

Story message. Speaker: "Voidbringers" (no concrete single entity, see the corresponding glossary entry on the Voidbringers) "Thrall" is a reference to the "enthralled" mechanic used by Voidbringer units in the game.

This is when the sono-recording turned into undistinguishable noise and screeches. Our delegation took flight while chaotic scenes of mayhem started to unfold, with people sacrificing each other as if they had no longer control over themselves.
这时，声波记录变成了一阵难以分辨的噪音和尖叫声。整个音乐会变得混乱不堪，人们似乎再也无法控制自己的身体，开始互相厮杀起来。我们的代表团趁机逃了出来。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)

What you describe, General, sounds no different than other well-orchestrated Psynumbra rituals we heard records of before. You should not let yourself be intimidated so easily. Once the ELOP Confederation has been dealt with, we will give Dali Ardelli and his ‘Voidbringer’ phantasms the treatment they deserve.
将军，你所描述的场景听起来和我们之前了解到的其他精心策划的赛努布拉仪式并没有什么不同，你不应该这么容易就被吓倒。等我们彻底解决掉星球平等联盟，我们将给予达里·阿德里和他的那些“虚空使者”幻影应有的待遇。
Attention! All Senators evacuate the premises immediately! This is an emergency situation – I repeat, everyone needs to take the readied rescue shuttles – NOW!
注意！所有参议员立即撤离！紧急情况——重复！所有人前往救援飞船——立即执行！
Story message. Speaker: "First Minister Tholian" (Paragon, male)
Alible Energy. Taste Of White Strains. Mellow Reality Waiting For Harvest.[br/][br/]Communion Will Commence.
滋养的能量。白色菌株的味道。芳醇的现实在等待收获。[br/][br/]通灵即将开始。
Story message. Speaker: "Voidbringers" (no concrete single entity, see the corresponding glossary entry on the Voidbringers)

Bwaha! The ELOP politicians are scattering to the headquarters of their military Commanders like scared cattle fleeing the slaughter. Normally I do not like it when others do my work, but in the end, victory and glory will still be ours!
哇哈！星球平等联盟的政客就像受惊的牛群逃离屠杀一样，一分而散逃往了他们军事指挥官的总部。通常我并不喜欢别人抢走我的工作，但到最后，胜利和荣耀仍然属于我们！

I find it hard to share your enthusiasm, my Chancellor. What happens if these Voidbringers should target one of our own divisions with their next attack? When their deployments happen out of the blue like this, how are we supposed to defend against them?
恐怕在这件事上，我很难与您保持同样的心情，首相。如果这些虚空使者下一次攻击的是我们怎么办？它们要是也像这样突然袭击，我们又该如何对抗呢？
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)

Your constant pessimism is starting to become a nuisance, General {STR_LeaderFirstName}. Do you truly have so little trust in the planning and military leadership of your Chancellor? We must first press our advantage in order to eradicate the ELOP Commanders. Afterwards, we can still fish for your krakens.
你悲观的情绪已经快要让人感到厌烦了，{STR_LeaderFirstName}将军。你真的对你首相的计划和军事领导如此缺乏信任吗？我们必须乘胜追击，消灭那些星球平等联盟指挥官。在那之后，我们再去钓上几只你所谓的“鱼怪”也不迟。
Physical Beings. Shorewalkers Of The Dark Void Sea.[br/]Linger Idly No Longer.[br/]Listen.[br/]Cleanse Your Worldly Desires.[br/]Listen.
肉体生物。黑暗虚空海洋岸边的行者。[br/]不再虚度。[br/]倾听。[br/]净化你的世俗欲望。[br/]倾听。
Story message. Speaker: "Voidbringers" (no concrete single entity, see the corresponding glossary entry on the Voidbringers)
Drink Our Dreams.[br/]Listen.[br/]Join The Waves.[br/]Listen.[br/]Satiate Our Hunger - Thrall!
饮下我们的梦境。[br/]倾听。[br/]加入海浪。[br/]倾听。[br/]满足我们的饥饿——奴役！
Story message. Speaker: "Voidbringers" (no concrete single entity, see the corresponding glossary entry on the Voidbringers)

Yes! I crave this malice, the irrepressible primal thirst from the depths of oblivion. Drink our energy! Intoxicate this realm with your captivating melodies! Together we will sing the self-fulfilling prophecy of all age’s end.
对！我渴望这种恶意，一种来自遗忘深处而无法抑制的原始渴望。饮下我们的能量！用迷人的旋律让这个国度沉醉！我们将一起唱出所有时代终结的自证预言。

There are Voidbringer comet shards dropping down all over the planet, tearing open portals to their dark dimension. Our orbital posts have noticed psionic energy spikes prior to each new incoming shard. The beacon on top of the ELOP Senate must be calling the other Voidbringers to Parlamon Alpha.
这个星球上到处都是虚空使者落下的彗星碎片，它们撕开了通往黑暗维度的入口。我们的轨道哨站发现，每有一块新的碎片降落，灵能能量就会达到峰值。肯定是星球平等联盟参议院顶上的信标在召唤其他的虚空使者前来帕尔拉蒙阿尔法星。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female) "beacon" is a reference to the "Voidbringer Beacon" structue in the game.

Very well. We’ll give these floating jellyfish the attention you have been asking for, General. Their lair or ‘beacon’ as you call it, is being protected by a powerful aether barrier. The only material that seems to be able to weaken it is the infused ore from their own comet.
好吧，如你所愿，将军。看来我们必须注意一下这些漂浮的水母了。它们的巢穴，也就是你所说的“信标”，被一种强大的以太屏障保护。唯一能够削弱它的物质似乎只有来自它们自己彗星的灌注矿石。

Then we must attack the Voidbringer spawners and collect enough comet fragments to push through the barrier. The ELOP Commanders are affected by this as much as we are, so there will still be time to deal with them afterwards.
既然如此，我们就必须攻击虚空使者的出生点，然后收集足够的彗星碎片来打破屏障。星球平等联盟的指挥官和我们一样都受到了影响，因此等我们解决掉这个问题之后再对付他们也不迟。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)
Make it so, General {STR_LeaderFirstName}! Tomorrow, I expect there to be sushi for breakfast.
就这么办，{STR_LeaderFirstName}将军！明天的早餐，给我来一份水母寿司。
Shakarn Chancellor.[br/]Listen To The Dark Void Sea.[br/]Hear The Voices Of The Timeless Ocean.[br/]Call Home.
蜥蜴人首相。[br/]聆听黑暗虚空的海洋。[br/]倾听永恒海洋之声。[br/]家园在呼唤你。
Story message. Speaker: "Voidbringers" (no concrete single entity, see the corresponding glossary entry on the Voidbringers)

Kadalos… I can see the submerged towers of Tekra in their mother-of-pearl shade, read the sonoscripts in the deep well of heroes. But all the citizens – my citizens – are lethargic, moving in trance, steered by the toxic nettles of… THEM!
卡达洛斯……我阅读了英雄深井中的音波史书，我看见泰克拉城的高塔被淹没在了它们珍珠母的阴影之中。所有的人民，我的人民，全都失去了生机，仿佛在梦境中游荡，遭到了毒害……是它们干的！
Story message. Speaker: "Chancellor Kor" (Shakarn, male) "Tekra" is the name of a Shakarn city. "Deep well of heroes" is the name of a Shakarn monument.
Roaaarr! Face me, Voidbringer monsters! Let me show you what a Shakarn can do with an omni rifle and a pair of fists…
啊啊啊！来啊，虚空使者怪物！我要让你见识见识，拎着全能步枪的一对拳头的蜥蜴人到底有多少能耐……
My Chancellor! Wait! Moving against the Voidbringers like this would be suicide...
首相！等等！如此对抗虚空使者无异于自杀……
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)
来吧。[br/]拥抱湮灭吧。[br/]再次和你的人民。[br/]重聚。
Story message. Speaker: "Voidbringers" (no concrete single entity, see the corresponding glossary entry on the Voidbringers)
It is too late, General {STR_LeaderFirstName}. Against the raw force of this waking tide, there can never be victory. You can only join Us. Or perish in the maelstrom of oblivion.
太迟了，{STR_LeaderFirstName}将军。面对这股唤起潮汐的纯粹之力，永远也不会获得胜利。你只能加入我们，或者在湮灭的大漩涡中消亡。
Story message. Speaker: "Chancellor Kor" (Shakarn, male) Enthralled by the Voidbringers.
Where my Chancellor commands me to go, I will go. Even if it leads me to the end of the world.
首相命令我去哪里，我就去哪里，即使这会带我前往世界的尽头。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)
Lucid Yellow Vibrations.[br/]Fulfill Our Will, Serf.[br/]Destroy All Resistance.
明晰的黄色振动。[br/]执行我们的意志，奴隶。[br/]消灭所有反抗者。
Story message. Speaker: "Voidbringers" (no concrete single entity, see the corresponding glossary entry on the Voidbringers)
You are not yourself anymore, my Chancellor. It is the Voidbringers speaking through you, attempting to squash all hope. But I will resist. For you. For our people. For Kadalos.
您已经迷失了自我，我的首相。您所说的话不过是虚空使者的意愿，试图粉碎所有的希望。但我必将反抗。为了您，为了我们的人民，为了卡达洛斯！
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)

The lone vulture is lost in the desert, left to watch his only fellow rot away in the sand. The Voidbringers are a terrible foe, {STR_LeaderName}, and while we had no knowledge of this immediate threat, we did possess the tools to keep it at bay. If it hadn’t been for your ruthless act of sabotage…
孤独的秃鹫迷失在了沙漠里，眼睁睁地看着他唯一的同伴在沙尘中腐烂。虚空使者是可怕的敌人，{STR_LeaderName}。虽然我们都未意识到这个威胁的到来，但我们曾经有办法将它们抵挡在外。如果不是因为你们鲁莽的破坏……
Story message. Speaker: "First Minister Tholian" (Paragon, male)

If this is supposed to be a moral lecture, you can save your breath, First Minister Tholian. Your former Empress already tried to pull a similar trick when she warned us about shutting down the Rift Reactor. But she was wrong. It may have saved the lousy ELOP, but your Void Storm did not protect the Shakarn Empire. The Voidbringers would have come for us either way.
如果这是一场道德说教，就别浪费口舌了，首席部长托利安。你们的女皇早在警告我们不要关闭裂隙反应堆的时候，就已经上演过类似的伎俩了。但她错了，裂隙反应堆也许能拯救你们卑微的星球平等联盟，但你们的虚空风暴并没有保护蜥蜴人帝国。不管怎样，那些虚空使者都会来找我们。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)

That may be true. But then they would have broken against the combined forces of the Shakarn invasion fleet instead of arriving when your home territory was defended the least.[br/][br/]You say that Carminia warned you about the Voidbringers? This in itself is another mystery that makes me wonder…
也许是吧。但那样的话，它们就会在蜥蜴人入侵舰队的联合部队面前溃不成军，而不是在你的家乡防卫最薄弱的时候突然袭击了。[br/][br/]你刚才说凯米尼亚警告过你虚空使者的到来？这本身就是另一个让我好奇的谜……
Story message. Speaker: "First Minister Tholian" (Paragon, male)

But regardless of any of this, the present asks for quick actions - and for leaders who can see past their preconceptions. If we keep fighting each other, Parlamon Alpha will get consumed by the Voidbringers. Whereas if we sign a truce and join forces, much could be achieved to mend the wounds opened during the past few weeks.
先不管这些了，当前最要紧的是迅速行动起来——身为首领，我们应该抛开先前的偏见。如果我们继续互相攻击，帕尔拉蒙阿尔法星将会被虚空使者吞噬。如果我们签署休战协议并联合起来，就可以在很大程度上弥补过去几周所造成的创伤。
Story message. Speaker: "First Minister Tholian" (Paragon, male)
接受星球平等联盟的和平提议

Your offer comes as a surprise, First Minister. A skilled warlord will crush his enemies when they are the most vulnerable, not accommodate them... Yet I share your assessment of the current situation that the Voidbringers can only be pushed back with concerted effort. The Scarlet Scepter accepts your temporary truce.
你的提议出乎意料，首席部长。老练的军阀会在敌人最脆弱的时候粉碎他们，而不是接纳他们……不过，我同意你对当前形势的评估，我们只有齐心协力才能击退那些虚空使者。绯红节杖接受你的临时休战提议。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)

Your generous offer for peace is laced with poison. The Shakarn forces are cut off from our empire, without reinforcements to arrive. Once the Voidbringers are driven from Parlamon Alpha, your ELOP Confederation would start to regroup and retrain new soldiers, until you eventually outnumber us on all fronts.
你那慷慨的和平提议里暗藏杀机。蜥蜴人部队已经与我们的帝国失去了联系，不会再有援军到来了。一旦虚空使者被赶出了帕尔拉蒙阿尔法星，你的星球平等联盟就会重新集结并训练新兵，直到最终在所有战线上都超过我们。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)
It is a pity that you expect others to follow your own treacherous mindset. This war has already caused too much bloodshed on all sides. In the end, the only winner will be the Voidbringers.
真是遗憾，你居然以自己背信弃义的心态来揣度别人。这场战争已经让各方牺牲了太多的鲜血。最终，虚空使者将成为唯一的赢家。
Story message. Speaker: "First Minister Tholian" (Paragon, male)
Pssst, {STR_LeaderName}. This is a secure channel. Can I have your attention?
喂，{STR_LeaderName}。这是一条加密频道。你能听见吗？

Story message. Speaker: "Nicole Crustus" (Vanguard, female) Actually, Nicole is a female Shakarn sleeper agent. She is talking from the perspective of her cover identity, so this is mostly irrelevant for translation itself, but good as some provided context.
What is it, petty human? I have declined the offer communicated by your First Minister. There is nothing left to talk about outside the battlefield.
你有什么事，卑微的人类？我已经拒绝了你们首席部长的提议。在战场之外，我们没有什么可谈的。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)

A good soldier of the Scarlet Scepter through and through, aren’t you? You remind me of my younger self, but years and years of mingling with the supposed enemy will slowly change your perspective. I don’t know whether it’s a blessing or a curse that, in view of the Voidbringer catastrophe, you are the white hope of the Shakarn race. But I do know that you need an ally…
我该怎么夸你呢？绯红节杖麾下彻头彻尾的好战士，不是吗？你让我想起了年轻时的自己，但长年累月与所谓的敌人打交道会慢慢改变一个人的看法。我该说这是一种祝福还是一种诅咒呢？考虑到这些虚空使者带来的灾难，只有你才是蜥蜴人一族的希望。但我知道，你需要一个盟友……

Story message. Speaker: "Nicole Crustus" (Vanguard, female) Actually, Nicole is a female Shakarn sleeper agent. She is talking from the perspective of her cover identity, so this is mostly irrelevant for translation itself, but good as some provided context.

…an ally, who will protect your flanks while both the Voidbringers and the ELOP Commanders are closing in from all sides.[br/][br/]And this old Shakarn deems herself qualified to get that job done. Tyra Krox is at your disposal, General.
……一个在虚空使者和星球平等联盟指挥官从四面八方逼近时，能够为你保护侧翼的盟友。[br/][br/]某位年长的蜥蜴人认为她自己有资格完成这项工作。泰拉·克罗斯，听候您的差遣，将军。
Story message. Speaker: "Tyra Krox" (Shakarn, female) The actual identity of Nicole Crustus.

I can’t believe it… you have been one of us all along! But why by the blood of Shazora did you not reveal yourself any earlier? Our Chancellor needed your support. Why wait until the odds are stacked up against us?
我不敢相信……原来你一直都是我们的一员！以沙索拉的鲜血之名啊，你为什么不早一点露面呢？我们的首相需要你的支援，为什么要等到形式对我们如此不利的时候才出现呢？
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)

It’s always easy to judge from a distance. Do you know what it is like to be in deep infiltration when the society around you collapses and all contact with your home empire stops… for decades and decades? I was born on Star Union soil many years after the Cataclysm. My parents were the only two Shakarn in the star system, like many other sleeper agents on many isolated worlds.
你们曾经身在遥远的天边，现在说起来当然轻巧。当你周围的社会突然崩塌，所有与自己家园的联系全部断绝……几十年又几十年……你能体会得到这种深入渗透是什么感觉吗？大灾变发生多年之后，我出生在了星际联盟的土地上。我的父母是这个星系中仅存的两个蜥蜴人，就像其他许多待在偏远星球上的潜伏特工一样。
Story message. Speaker: "Tyra Krox" (Shakarn, female) The actual identity of Nicole Crustus.

Not everybody wants to wait out their lives in the vague hope of a returning empire. So we settled down and mingled to lead some semi-normal lives. An act of desertion and treason, as it was always stigmatized by the Scarlet Scepter. Even I accused my parents of this when I was young. But I had many years to learn from that mistake.
并不是所有蜥蜴人都想在回归帝国的渺茫希望中度过一生。所以我们安顿了下来，混迹在所谓的敌人之中，过着看似正常的生活。这是一种遗弃和背叛，在绯红节杖眼中看来永远是一种耻辱。当我还小的时候，我甚至还为此指责过我的父母。但多年之后，我意识到了自己的错误并从中获得了反思。
Story message. Speaker: "Tyra Krox" (Shakarn, female) The actual identity of Nicole Crustus.

If all of this is true, then why are you now here offering me your help? It doesn’t sound like you would be on very good terms with the Scarlet Scepter and its present highest-ranking representative – me.
如果这一切都是真的，那你为什么现在要来帮我？听起来你不像是那种能够与绯红节杖目前职位最高的领导者——也就是我，相处得很愉快的那种人。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)

I am still a Shakarn, {STR_LeaderName}. I have dreamed of Kadalos and the deep well of heroes many times, yet I only know that world from holo-images and sonoscripts. If we don’t win this battle against the Voidbringers, our home will be lost. All Shakarn would become exiles like me and my parents. I cannot let this happen.
但我本质上还是一名蜥蜴人，{STR_LeaderName}。我曾多次在梦中看见过卡达洛斯和英雄深井，但我只能通过全息影像和音波史书才能了解我的家乡。如果我们不能打赢这场战争，我们的家园将彻底消逝。所有的蜥蜴人都会像我和我父母一样成为流亡者，我不能让这种事情发生。
Story message. Speaker: "Tyra Krox" (Shakarn, female) The actual identity of Nicole Crustus.
Take that, you oversized jellyfish! This one’s for the Chancellor![br/][br/]With another shard collected we’re getting closer to breaking through the energy shield. Just one more…
接招，你这发育过度的大号水母！这一击是为了首相！[br/][br/]又收集到了一块碎片，我们离突破能量护盾越来越近了。只需要再收集一块……
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)
Your Actions Acid Noise.[br/]Your Existence Loud Sour Touch Of The Wriggling Ocean.[br/]Disintegrate.[br/]End.
你的行为发出酸臭的噪音。[br/]你的存在像是触碰涌动海洋时强烈的酸味。[br/]瓦解。[br/]终结。
Story message. Speaker: "Voidbringers" (no concrete single entity, see the corresponding glossary entry on the Voidbringers)
We have the means to break through the shield and attack the Voidbringer beacon. Now let’s show these denizens from beyond the Abyss what we Shakarn are made of!
我们可以突破护盾了，准备进攻虚空使者的信标。现在，让我们给这些来自深渊另一边的生物见识一下我们蜥蜴人的本事！
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)
受苦。[br/]碎裂。[br/]在剧毒的振动中长眠。[br/]溺毙。立刻。
Story message. Speaker: "Voidbringers" (no concrete single entity, see the corresponding glossary entry on the Voidbringers)
Now that enough shards to break through the Voidbringer shield have been collected, it is time to assault their beacon and push these denizens of the Void back to where they came from!
我们已经收集到了足够的碎片来突破虚空使者的护盾，是时候进攻它们的信标了。让这些来自虚空的居民滚回虚空里去！
Countable objective description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.
Malediction.[br/]Purple Smell Of Rippling Reflections.[br/]Hunger Remains.[br/][br/]Eternal.
诅咒。[br/]涟漪倒影的紫色气味。[br/]饥饿依旧。[br/][br/]永恒。
Story message. Speaker: "Voidbringers" (no concrete single entity, see the corresponding glossary entry on the Voidbringers)
The remaining Voidbringers are vanishing into the closing portals, releasing their Thralls to finally rest in peace.[br/][br/]Congratulations, General. We did it!
剩下的虚空使者消失在了逐渐关闭的传送门中，被它们奴役的人们终于能够安息了。[br/][br/]祝贺你，将军。我们做到了！
Story message. Speaker: "Tyra Krox" (Shakarn, female) The actual identity of Nicole Crustus.
ELOP. Syndicate. Voidbringers. In the end, they all succumbed to our might. Because such is the legacy of the Shakarn: We learn. We overcome. And we conquer!
星球平等联盟、辛迪加还有虚空使者。最后，他们都屈服于我们的力量。因为这就是蜥蜴人的传统：我们学习，我们克服，我们征服！

Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female) The last four sentences are a reference to the Shakarn01 mission briefing written out in the ScenarioDefinitions_DLC04Campaign.xml. Please translate consistently.
The vulture has shed its skin and feathers to turn into a grey dove. Important victories are often the heralds of remembrance and mourning, {STR_LeaderName}.
秃鹫褪下了皮囊和羽毛，变成了一只灰色的鸽子。重大的胜利往往是纪念和哀悼的先兆，{STR_LeaderName}。
Story message. Speaker: "First Minister Tholian" (Paragon, male)
I disagree, First Minister of the Egalitarian League of Planets. Victory is when the glory gets distributed. Only the weak mourn their losses.
星球平等联盟首席部长阁下，我不同意你的说法。只有获得荣耀才算作胜利，而只有弱者才会哀悼损失。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)
Red Vibrations Ended.[br/]Eternal Hunger Satisfied.[br/][br/]For Now.
红色振动停止。[br/]永恒饥饿满足。[br/][br/]暂时。
Story message. Speaker: "Voidbringers" (no concrete single entity, see the corresponding glossary entry on the Voidbringers)
Come, General {STR_LeaderFirstName}. There is something I want you to see.[br/][br/](The Chancellor switches on a monitor, which is transmitting live footage from inside a remote testing chamber.)
来，{STR_LeaderFirstName}将军。我给你看些东西。[br/][br/]（首相打开了一个显示器，画面上传来了一个远程测试室的实时视频。）
(A human soldier is standing motionless in the middle of the empty room. There are fleshy tendrils sprouting from the back of his head.)
（一名人类士兵一动不动地站在空荡的房间中央，他的后脑勺部位长出了一些肉质的触须。）
Story message. Speaker: "Xenoplague Test Subject" (Vanguard, male)

Our scientists have been experimenting with this Xenoplague parasite over the past few weeks. It is an interesting study to see how symbiosis with the Alpha Strain can change the attributes and behavior of its host.
在过去的几周，我们的科学家一直在用这种异星疫病寄生物做实验。这是一项十分有趣的研究，我们想弄明白与初始毒株的共生关系究竟是如何改变其宿主的特征和行为的。

In the past, it has always proven to be a tedious task to govern and occupy races conquered by the Scarlet Scepter. How often did we have to put down rebellions or relocate the population of entire planets? With the right use of the Xenoplague, however, all that could change…
过去，统治和占领被绯红节杖征服的种族一直以来都是最乏味的任务。我们有多少次不得不镇压叛乱，或者重新安置整个星球的人口？但如果我们恰到好处地利用异星疫病，这一切都将改变……
(A series of commands are transmitted into the testing chamber. In accordance with them, and without any sign of emotion, the soldier moves to the different corners of the room.)
（随着一系列命令传达至测试室，那名士兵按照指示毫无表情地在房间各个角落来回踱步。）
Story message. Speaker: "Xenoplague Test Subject" (Vanguard, male)

Imagine that, instead of setting up a complete military occupation, we release a specific variant of the Alpha Strain on the target population, a variant that changes their behavior patterns, suppressing any urges to dissent or rebel, while at the same time enhancing their physical capabilities. The perfect worker slaves would be born.
想象一下，我们不再需要建立完整的军事占领体系，而只需要在目标人口中释放特定的变种初始毒株，从而改变他们的行为模式，抑制任何反抗或叛逆的冲动，同时还能增强他们的体能。完美的奴工将就此诞生。

What a… thorough and definitive solution, my Chancellor. Your wisdom and vision continue to serve as an inspiration for all Shakarn.[br/][br/]How… long do you expect it to still take, until this new Alpha Strain variant will be ready? Surely this is still all at an early stage…
多么……周密而彻底的解决方案啊，首相。您的智慧和远见将继续激励所有的蜥蜴人。[br/][br/]以您的估计……这种新的初始毒株还需要多久才能准备就绪？当然，这一切仍处于早期阶段……
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)

On the contrary, General, I expect the first large-scale field tests to commence soon. It is the scientific project of highest priority in the empire and has the most brilliant and loyal researchers dedicated to it.
恰恰相反，将军。我预计第一次大规模实地测试很快将会展开。这是目前帝国优先级最高的科学项目，我们配备了最聪明和最忠诚的研究人员为此精心钻研。
How very… fortunate. These surely are blessed times for the Scarlet Scepter and its leaders.
那真是……太好了。对于绯红节杖和蜥蜴人的首领来说，这确实是值得庆祝的时刻。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)

It is time, General {STR_LeaderFirstName}. The moment to test the new Alpha Strain on the masses has come. Give the order to pillage the city and we can relocate the inhabitants to our prepared testing grounds.
时机已到，{STR_LeaderFirstName}将军。是时候在民众身上测试新的初始毒株了。下令洗劫城市，这样一来我们就可以把这里的住民重新安置到准备好的试验场去。
Don’t do it, {STR_LeaderName}! I beg you to stop this madness. What you are planning to do is nothing less than organized genocide!
别这样做，{STR_LeaderName}将军！我请求你们停止这种疯狂的行为，这一计划无异于一场有组织的种族灭绝行动！
Story message. Speaker: "James/Jane Henkins" (Vanguard, can be male or female depending on the gender of "Naranga Od". Always has the opposite gender of "Naranga Od".)

Explain to me this outrage, General {STR_LeaderFirstName}! Not only is there a human carrying Shakarn weapons, knowing Shakarn secrets. But she also has the audacity to eavesdrop on our conversation and interfere!
请给我一个合理的解释，{STR_LeaderFirstName}将军！区区一个人类，不仅携带着蜥蜴人的武器，知道蜥蜴人的秘密，居然还有胆量偷听我们的谈话并妄图干涉！

Explain to me this outrage, General {STR_LeaderFirstName}! Not only is there a human carrying Shakarn weapons, knowing Shakarn secrets. But he also has the audacity to eavesdrop on our conversation and interfere!
请给我一个合理的解释，{STR_LeaderFirstName}将军！区区一个人类，不仅携带着蜥蜴人的武器，知道蜥蜴人的秘密，居然还有胆量偷听我们的谈话并妄图干涉！

It’s not a secret when half your troops are bragging about the biological weapon that will enslave the enemy.[br/][br/]Listen to me, {STR_LeaderFirstName}! You were wrong when you said the Shakarn would never mingle with other species. Did you not mingle with us humans during the past three years? And what about all other agents ever sent out for infiltration?
你手下的部队有一半人都在吹嘘说有一种能够奴役敌人的生物武器，这早就不是什么秘密了。[br/][br/]听我说，{STR_LeaderFirstName}！你曾经说蜥蜴人永远也不会和其他物种混迹在一起，你错了。你在过去的三年里难道就不是在和我们人类交往吗？还有其他那些被派去执行渗透任务的特工呢？
Story message. Speaker: "James/Jane Henkins" (Vanguard, can be male or female depending on the gender of "Naranga Od". Always has the opposite gender of "Naranga Od".)

You Shakarn have a remarkable talent for learning and fitting in with foreign cultures. What will be left of your own identity, once you wiped every other civilization off the galaxy? I know that this is not who you are and what you want, {STR_LeaderFirstName}. Else you would have killed me back on Celaudius-2.
你们蜥蜴人在学习和适应异族文化方面具有非凡的天赋。假如你们将银河系中的其他文明全部抹杀，又还会剩下多少属于你们自己的特性呢？我知道这不是你的本心，也不是你希望看到的结果，{STR_LeaderFirstName}。否则，你早在克劳迪乌斯 2 号星上时就已经把我给杀了。
Story message. Speaker: "James/Jane Henkins" (Vanguard, can be male or female depending on the gender of "Naranga Od". Always has the opposite gender of "Naranga Od".)
I am sorry, Jane. This is beyond the scope of just you and me.[br/][br/]Charge the omni-weapons, soldiers! We have a city to incinerate.
对不起，简。这不止是你我之间的事情。[br/][br/]士兵们，准备好武器！我们将摧毁这座城市。
I am sorry, James. This is beyond the scope of just you and me.[br/][br/]Charge the omni-weapons, soldiers! We have a city to incinerate.
对不起，詹姆斯。这不止是你我之间的事情。[br/][br/]士兵们，准备好武器！我们将摧毁这座城市。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)
Then let me be the first victim of your war crime![br/][br/]Please forgive me, my David. I have betrayed your memory…
既然如此，那就让我成为你们战争罪行的第一个受害者吧！[br/][br/]请原谅我，我的大卫。我背叛了你的记忆……
Then let me be the first victim of your war crime![br/][br/]Please forgive me, my Sarah. I have betrayed your memory…
既然如此，那就让我成为你们战争罪行的第一个受害者吧！[br/][br/]请原谅我，我的莎拉。我背叛了你的记忆……

Story message. Speaker: "James/Jane Henkins" (Vanguard, can be male or female depending on the gender of "Naranga Od". Always has the opposite gender of "Naranga Od".) "David" and "Sarah" are the first names of the Vanguard (male and female) characters that were married to "James/Jane Henkins" (always heterosexual marriage assumed).

I am sorry, my Chancellor, but I cannot burden my conscience with the lives of all these people. The human may be overly dramatic in her choice of words; however, she has a point: there is no need for additional cruelty in this already gruesome war.
抱歉，我的首相，我无法让我的良心承担这么多无辜的性命。这位人类的措辞可能有些夸张，但有一点她说得没错：这场战争已经够可怕了，我们的做法只会平添更多的残忍。

I am sorry, my Chancellor, but I cannot burden my conscience with the lives of all these people. The human may be overly dramatic in his choice of words; however, he has a point: there is no need for additional cruelty in this already gruesome war.
抱歉，我的首相，我无法让我的良心承担这么多无辜的性命。这位人类的措辞可能有些夸张，但有一点他说得没错：这场战争已经够可怕了，我们的做法只会平添更多的残忍。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)

You refuse to execute the direct orders of your Chancellor? This is treason, General {STR_LeaderFirstName}! Lucky for you, the Scarlet Scepter does not forget your past merit on Celaudius-2. But once this war is cooling down, it would be wise of you to request an early retirement.
你胆敢拒绝执行首相的直接命令？你这是公然叛变，{STR_LeaderFirstName}将军！幸运的是，绯红节杖不会忘记你在克劳迪乌斯 2 号星上的功绩。不过，等这场战争平息之后，你最好识趣地申请提前退休。

Are you certain, my Chancellor, that it is necessary to abduct the entire population of this colony? Surely, enough data can still be gathered if we limit our tests to a smaller set of individuals. Someone needs to be left to kneel down at our victory parades after all…
首相，您确定有必要对一整个殖民地的居民进行测试吗？即使我们把测试限制在一组更小的群体中，我们仍然可以收集到足够的数据。毕竟，我们在举行胜利游行时还需要有人下跪臣服……
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)

Why think small when we have an entire planet of test subjects at our disposal? The new Alpha Strain is ready, and the only good way to test the effectiveness of a bio-agent is to throw it on the masses. But that’s enough hesitation. Do it, General {STR_LeaderFirstName}!
整个星球都可以成为我们的测试对象，为什么还要小家子气呢？新的初始毒株已经准备好了，检验这一生物制剂有效性的唯一方法就是将其投入大众。犹豫不决的时刻到此为止。立即执行吧，{STR_LeaderFirstName}将军！
As you wish, my Chancellor. Charge the omni-weapons, soldiers! We have a city to incinerate.
如您所愿，首相。士兵们，准备好武器！我们将摧毁这座城市。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)

I am sorry, my Chancellor, but I cannot burden my conscience with the lives of all these civilians. Wasn’t the original intent of our people to defend against the Star Union, not to annihilate it? There is no need for additional cruelty in this already gruesome war.
抱歉，我的首相，我无法让我的良心承担这么多无辜的性命。我们人民的最初意图是要反抗星际联盟，而不是要消灭它，不是吗？这场战争已经够可怕了，我们的做法只会平添更多的残忍。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)
Chancellor Kor has asked you to raze the conquered colony and send its inhabitants to his prepared testing area.
科尔首相命令你把征服的殖民地夷为平地，然后将居民带往他准备好的试验区。
Good. Very good. For a moment, it looked like you would back off, General {STR_LeaderFirstName}. Instead you continue to be an exemplar of Shakarn strength!
好，非常好。有那么一瞬间，你似乎想打退堂鼓，{STR_LeaderFirstName}将军。看来，你还是选择了成为蜥蜴人力量的楷模！
Countable objective description. The values in between {} will read something like '3/5'.
What are you doing, General {STR_LeaderFirstName}? Soldiers, take care of this traitor!
你干什么，{STR_LeaderFirstName}将军？士兵们，拿下这个叛徒！
Without the support of my own troops, I will be arrested to face a treason trial. I’m afraid that this is the end.
没有了手下部队的支持，我将被逮捕起来并面临叛国罪的审判。恐怕一切就此结束了。
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)

I’ve carved my way through the Redeemers, fought tirelessly against the corruption of the Adamant Council. My daughter Inessa, now the entire weight of the Zhelezo Consortium rests on your shoulders! Be strong!
我曾一路披荆斩棘对抗救赎者，不知疲倦地与腐败的坚毅委员会作斗争。伊涅萨，我的女儿啊，现在泽勒佐财团的全部重担都压在你的肩膀上了！坚持下去！

Story message. Speaker: "Korvin Zhelezo" (Dvar, male) "Redeemers" is the name of an Assembly splinter group showing up in the Dvar base game campaign. Please translate consistently. "Adamant Council" is the name of the Dvar ruling gremium. "Inessa" is the first name of a female Dvar character.
My brethren, swarm with me! Remember the teachings of Hatyl Ur’Uk and carry my last dream back to Xa’Kir’Ko.
兄弟姐妹们，与我同行！记住哈泰尔·乌鲁克的教导，把我最后的梦境带回札奇尔寇。
Story message. Speaker: "Poz Tk'Nor" (Kir'Ko, male) "Hatyl Ur'Uk" is the name of a male Kir'Ko character. "Xa Kir'Ko" is the name of the Kir'Ko home planet.

I always believed that every death also sprouts new life. Yet it is hard to take comfort in that when all cosmic gardens are destined to wither. My consciousness could escape into the digital world, but what is it worth when I can no longer smell any flowers or breathe the fresh air of a misty forest?
我始终相信，每一次死亡都孕育着新的生命。然而，若是所有的宇宙花园都注定要枯萎，我们也很难从中得到慰藉。我的意识可以逃入数字世界，但我再也闻不到花香，再也呼吸不到雾林的新鲜空气，这又有什么意义呢？

Cryosleep suddenly doesn’t seem so bad when you’re facing eternal oblivion. The Celestian light guided me away from a path of conflict, yet it is still conflict that has found and ended me.[br/][br/]The irony…
当你面对永恒的湮灭时，突然就觉得冷冻休眠也没那么糟糕。星神之光指引我走上了一条远离冲突的道路，然而斗争还是发现并终结了我。[br/][br/]真是讽刺……

Story message. Speaker: "Nicole Crustus" (Vanguard, female) Actually, Nicole is a female Shakarn sleeper agent. She is talking from the perspective of her cover identity, so this is mostly irrelevant for translation itself, but good as some provided context.
The sixteen seas are irrevocably calling me to dwell in their coldest depths. If you ever make it back to Kadalos, {STR_LeaderName}, promise me to place a lotus-shell in the Pearlshade Sanctuary.
十六海在召唤我去往最寒冷的海底深处。如果你能回到卡达洛斯，{STR_LeaderName}，请答应我在珠影圣所中放上一块莲花贝壳。
Story message. Speaker: "Tyra Krox" (Shakarn, female) The actual identity of Nicole Crustus. "Pearlshade Sanctuary" is the name of a temple on Kadalos.
Keep… resisting… General… {STR_LeaderFirstName}. Our people… need…
抗争……到底……将军……{STR_LeaderFirstName}。我们的人民……需要……
Your death will be avenged, my Chancellor. We will push these Voidbringers back into the dark dimension from whence they came!
我必将为您复仇，我的首相。我们要把这些虚空使者驱逐回它们黑暗的维度！
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)
战斗……到底……将军……{STR_LeaderFirstName}。我们的人民……
Story message. Speaker: "Voidbringers" (no concrete single entity, see the corresponding glossary entry on the Voidbringers)
My body may die here on Parlamon Alpha, but my songs, my legacy, will live on. The chants from the Abyss are awaiting me…
也许我的肉体将在帕尔拉蒙阿尔法星死去，但我的乐曲和遗产将会永世长存。来自深渊的圣歌正在等待着我……
Bah, I’ve been through much worse situations than this before! It’s barely a flesh wound…
呸，我经历过比这更糟糕的情况！只不过是个皮外伤而已……

Marshal, you don’t have to waste your last breath sounding tough. We all know you are. It has been a privilege to have you fighting by my side. Your sonoscript will receive its place in the deep well of heroes. I will make sure of it!
元帅，到这时候就没必要再嘴硬了。我们都了解你，有你在我身边战斗是我的荣幸。你的音波史书一定会在英雄深井中闪耀。我向你保证！
Story message. Speaker: "Naranga Od" (Shakarn, can be both male or female)

Live and let die sounds so much better when you are the one pulling the trigger. I should have listened to my clutch mother when she said: “Never go to the front lines, my son, if you want to die as a spy.”
如果你是扣动扳机的那个人，生与死的概念就让我感觉好受多了。当初我应该听从育母的话，她说：“我的孩子，如果你想象间谍一样死去，就永远不要上前线。”

Story message. Speaker: "Vastrix Zokla" (Shakarn, male) "clutch mother" is the name for a Shakarn nursery teacher. "live and let die" is a reference to the song and James Bond movie with the same name.
Dav- I mean, {STR_LeaderFirstName}. Can you do me a last favor? Activate your holo projector and let me see his face again. Please.
大卫，不……{STR_LeaderFirstName}。你能帮我最后一个忙吗？请打开你的全息投影仪，让我再看看他的脸。拜托了。
Sar- I mean, {STR_LeaderFirstName}. Can you do me a last favor? Activate your holo projector and let me see her face again. Please.
莎拉，不……{STR_LeaderFirstName}。你能帮我最后一个忙吗？请打开你的全息投影仪，让我再看看她的脸。拜托了。

Story message. Speaker: "James/Jane Henkins" (Vanguard, can be male or female depending on the gender of "Naranga Od". Always has the opposite gender of "Naranga Od".) "David" and "Sarah" are the first names of the Vanguard (male and female) characters that were married to "James/Jane Henkins" (always heterosexual marriage assumed).
Very well, Jane. I hope you can reunite with him in some sort of afterlife. I really do.
好吧，简。希望来世你能再和他相聚。我是认真的。
Very well, James. I hope you can reunite with her in some sort of afterlife. I really do.
好吧，詹姆斯。希望来世你能再和她相聚。我是认真的。
